pages.text: Say O Muhammad to those who have rejected Faith: "O you infidels
I do not worship the idols which you worship
Nor do you worship Allah, Whom I worship
Nor do I observe your religious rites, but I observe what accords with fact and reason and with what is logically sound
Nor do you observe Allah’s ordinances or such advice as Allah inclines you to propound
You have your religion and I have mine
When Allah's help and victory come to pass and the gates of Macca are declared open to you O Muhammad
And you see the people embracing Allah’s system of faith and worship in great numbers
Then praise Allah, your Creator, and extoll His attributes and accord, and invoke His forgiveness and concord, for indeed, He always accepts repentance and the atonements made by the people
Perish the hands of Abu Lahab, (the instruments of his cruel actions against those who recognized Allah) and likewise perish he
Neither his wealth nor all his gains will save him from what awaits him of retributive punishment
He shall suffer the blazing fire which emits mountainous flames
Along with his slanderous wife who carried bundles of thorny wood (and laid them in the Prophet’s path to cause him bodily injury and to render his mission vain)
She shall be necklaced with a similar twisted rope to double her torment and augment her pain
